ABOUT.TITLE: About Me
ABOUT.SUBTITLE: Junior Developer in apprenticeship
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION: Currently in 2nd year of engineering school at ISIMA in Clermont-Ferrand, I am on a work-study program at CGI for the client Michelin.
ABOUT.MORE: As a network and development enthusiast, I am curious to discover new ways of programming as well as new technologies. I have carried out several projects in Flutter, and numerous APIs in PHP Slim as well as in Java SpringBoot. I am developing a microservice in Spring Boot and a full stack Angular/NodeJs application as part of my work-study program, which allows me to develop my skills in Java, NodeJs and Angular.

SKILLS.TITLE: Skills
SKILLS.DESCRIPTION: Here are my different skills along with their proficiency level:

PIANO.TITLE: Piano
PIANO.DESC: My grandmother taught me piano when I was in primary school, and I resumed as a self-taught musician 5 years ago

CHANT.TITLE: Singing
CHANT.DESC: I recently started learning singing with a teacher so I can accompany my mother who plays guitar

BOXE.TITLE: Boxing
BOXE.DESC: A coach at my gym introduced me to Thai and English boxing with a punching bag, and I continued by joining an English boxing club since early 2025

MUSCU.TITLE: Weight training
MUSCU.DESC: I was enrolled at the gym for 3 years, and now I continue by practicing Street Workout.

COURSE.TITLE: Running
COURSE.DESC: I started training in early 2024, and I completed the 'Course des Volcans' (25km, 550d+) and the 'Course des 9 Clochers' (28km, 550d+) at the end of 2024

CINEMA.TITLE: Cinema
CINEMA.DESC: A cinephile thanks to my sister and parents, I continue going to the cinema regularly and enjoy sharing my favorite movies and series with my friends and family
